root: ^Caution: Re-routing power will temporarily open all blast doors.
^Scans indicate that there are; [7] [Employees] currently residing in Blast Shelters.
^Additional power will be diverted to our route throughout this facility.
^Do you wish to proceed with this action?

c-0: ^Blast Doors - Open, Temporary Overide for [3] Minutes.
c-1: ^Too many people for a little personal advantage.
